members.joinCircumstances: Leader of the Shandia warriors fighting to reclaim Upper Yard
Young Shandia girl with natural Mantra ability used for reconnaissance

keyMoments.title: Shandia Plan Their Assault
keyMoments.description: Wyper and the Shandia warriors hold a strategy meeting to plan their attack on Upper Yard, analyzing the situation with Gan Fall and Enel.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Shandia's organized military strategy and their determination to reclaim their ancestral homeland.

keyMoments.title: Launch Assault on Upper Yard
keyMoments.description: The Shandia warriors launch their major offensive to reclaim Upper Yard from Enel, believing the time is right after two warriors have fallen.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the Shandia's all-out war to reclaim their homeland taken 400 years ago.
